title: Track a Corrective Action Plan
description: An auditor is following up on a corrective action plan (CAP) submitted by a department in response to a previous audit.

tasks.description: Locate the original audit finding and the associated CAP.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor pulls up the relevant files in the audit management system.

tasks.description: Review the CAP to see the promised actions and deadlines.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor reviews the steps the department promised to take.

tasks.description: Check for evidence that the corrective actions have been completed.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor verifies that the department has submitted evidence of completing the required actions, allowing the finding to be closed.
